title: Vox Machina Ep. 44 - The Sunken Tomb
description: Vox Machina find themselves deep within a lost shrine to the Raven Queen in search of an artifact that may help them defeat the Chroma conclave. But more danger lurks within the shrine than they could possibly be prepared for! With special guests Will Friedle and Mary Elizabeth Mcglynn.
